remarks: Version of ~ cbvex2v with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbval2vv.1 $e |- ( ( x = z /\ y = w ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-cbvex2vv $p |- ( E. x E. y ph <-> E. z E. w ps ) $.
$d ph w z $.
$d ps x y $.
$d w x y z $.
